<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King, a proclamation of His Majesties grace, favour, and pardon to the inhabitants of his counties of Stafford and Derby England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I) Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
1 broadside.
By Leonard Lichfield ..., Printed at Oxford : 1642 [i.e. 1643]
"Given at our court at Oxford, this sixth day of March, in the eighteenth yeare of our reigne." Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

1 broadside.
By Leonard Lichfield ..., Printed at Oxford : 1642 [i.e. 1643]
"Given at our court at Oxford, this sixth day of March, in the eighteenth yeare of our reigne." Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
